name: Zombies And Zappers
description: This arcade game called "Zombies and Zappers" is heavily inspired by the popular and old game "Space Invaders" except the art is different, and some game elements have been added like upgrades and music. Music from "Street Fighter ll - Arcade Version" at the "Ryu Stage". This was made for a game jam. I have a personal high score of "52,575"
